tool_description: Zip Code API - Free Access to Worldwide Postal Code Data

api_list.name: Postalcode to location information (/search)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to receive information for one or multiple given postalcodes.

required_parameters.name: codes
required_parameters.description: A postal code or a list of postal codes to search for.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country code to filter the postal codes by.
